text: ini, avar (dampatimar) tam'mil bhinnicc peakumenn ninnal bhayappetunna paksam avanre alkkaril ninn oru mad'dhyasthaneyum avalute alkkaril ninn oru mad'dhyasthaneyum ninnal niyeagikkuka. iru vibhagavum anuranjanaman uddesikkunnatenkil allahu avarkkitayil yeajippuntakkunnatanâ€Œ. tirccayayum allahu sarvvajnanum suksmajnanumakunnu
